name: Mermaid Games - Mermaid Pop
description:
---- Download for Free for Limited Time !!!! ----
Fun and addictive bubble shoot game!
Clear all the bubbles on the screen to level up,and try to get 3 stars on each level.

How to play:
1.Tap where you like the bubble.
2.To group 3 or more bubbles to make them POP.
Breaking the bubbles continuously can get points as bonus.

If you like games like bubble shoots then you have to try this one!
